conbody.p: 3 Main components are used to created a complete glider plan:

ul.li: GUI: allows all data management in a user friendly way
Geometry-Processor: does in the background the main calculations for the outile geometry of the wing
Wing-Processor: does then at the final end all the detailed calculations and creates all plans

conbody.p: The manual does just explain the GUI and how to start both processors.
More explanations you can find on the developer website: Laboratory d'envol
